title: (x) washingtonpost.com - Futura {Chesh}
content:
[img] [http://media.washingtonpost.com/wp-srv/globalnav/images/wpcomBigLogo.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080108193942/http:/media.washingtonpost.com/wp-srv/globalnav/images/wpcomBigLogo.gif)[/img]   
   
   
It's not Helvetica, I know (squashing nonwithstanding). The closest I got was Drescher Grotesk, but the S is wrong.

comments.content: You gotta love the TIB. Answers in seconds.
